languages.text: {n}Воздух за спиной Маражая идет рябью — вы видите, как из пустоты начинает проступать едва видный силуэт демонетки. Безобразный рот распахнут в победоносном оскале, огромная клешня начинает подниматься...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Воздух за спиной Маражая идет рябью — вы видите, как из пустоты начинает проступать едва видный силуэт демонетки. Безобразный рост распахнут в победоносном оскале, огромная клешня начинает подниматься...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух за спиной Маражая идет рябью — вы видите, как из пустоты начинает проступать едва видный силуэт демонетки. Безобразный рот распахнут в победоносном оскале, огромная клешня начинает подниматься...{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}L'air se met à onduler derrière Marazhai, puis vous voyez la silhouette de la démonette se dessiner dans le néant avant de se matérialiser pour de bon. La bouche repoussante affiche un rictus triomphant, tandis que la large pince s'élève de plus en plus...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air se met à onduler derrière Marazhai, puis vous voyez la silhouette de la démonette se dessiner dans le néant avant de se matérialiser pour de bon. La bouche repoussante affiche un rictus triomphant, tandis que la large pince s'élève de plus en plus...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの背後で空気が波打ち、デモネットのシルエットがかすかに浮かび上がる。おぞましい口元が勝ち誇ったような嘲笑を浮かべ、大きなハサミを高く振り上げる…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの背後で空気が波打ち、デモネットのシルエットがかすかに浮かび上がる。おぞましい口元が勝ち誇ったような嘲笑を浮かべ、大きなハサミを高く振り上げる…{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋身后的空气不断荡漾着，你看到欲魔隐约可见的影子从稀薄的空气中渗了出来。那只恶魔可怕的嘴巴得意地讥笑着，手中的巨钳越举越高……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋身后的空气不断荡漾着，你看到欲魔隐约可见的影子从稀薄的空气中渗了出来。那只恶魔可怕的嘴巴得意地讥笑着，手中的巨钳越举越高……{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Die Luft hinter Marazhai regt sich. Du siehst zu, wie die kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette der Dämonette sich aus dem Nichts herauskristallisiert. Der grauenhafte Mund grinst triumphal, der große Greifer hebt sich immer höher und höher ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Luft hinter Marazhai regt sich. Du siehst zu, wie die kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette der Dämonette sich aus dem Nichts herauskristallisiert. Der grauenhafte Mund grinst triumphal, der große Greifer hebt sich immer höher und höher ...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}El aire se agita trémulamente detrás de Marazhai, y contemplas cómo la figura apenas visible de la diablilla se materializa de la nada. Esboza una sonrisa triunfal con su espantosa boca, y su enorme pinza se eleva cada vez más...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire se agita trémulamente detrás de Marazhai, y contemplas cómo la figura apenas visible de la diablilla se materializa de la nada. Esboza una sonrisa triunfal con su espantosa boca, y su enorme pinza se eleva cada vez más...{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın arkasındaki hava dalgalanıyor. İblisiçe'nin silüetinin havada hafifçe belirdiğini fark ediyorsun. Dev kıskacı giderek yükselirken korkunç ağzı da zafer ve küçümsemeyle gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The air behind Marazhai ripples, and you watch as the Daemonette's faintly visible silhouette bleeds out of thin air. The horrible mouth is sneering triumphantly, the large pincer is rising higher and higher...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın arkasındaki hava dalgalanıyor ve İblisiçe'nin silüetinin havada belirdiğini ve hafifçe görülebildiğini fark ediyorsun. Korkunç ağzı zafer ve küçümsemeyle gülümsüyor, dev kıskacı giderek yükseliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
